name: Twisted Conqueror
description:
An evil demon has taken over the world and pervert it. Now every item lies to you. Defeat the demon and free the world from the curse.  

Twisted Conqueror - is a little funny platformer with lying mechanics. Overcome forests, mountains and get to the cave in which the demon lives 

This game was made for Community Game Jam 24.08.2019 - 31.08.2019

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space

Attack - Left mouse button
